message: Finally, we're back in the real world.
When I look around, I see everyone else waking up too.

We're in a different area than before. Noiz did say he had to expand the field.

Maybe it warped space somehow, so we ended up moving farther than we thought.
My head aches, though it's less pain and more a smothering weight.
As I try to sit up, I feel something touch my hand.
A small, blue paw.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."
...Ren.
Ren is looking at me, his tongue hanging out like always.
My eyes grow hot, and I shut them tight to keep the tears from flowing.
He made it...
I'm so... so glad...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
I pick up his fluffy blue body and raise him to my face.
Our foreheads meet. Ren doesn't push me away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thank goodness."

name: 蓮
message: "I'm sorry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's fine. Really."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."
Something has changed inside me. I know what it is.
Before, Ren was part of my consciousness―in a very real sense, me.
But now Ren has formed his own identity, and I've recognized him as existing apart from myself.
It should have been impossible. No wonder my head feels strange.
But I have no regrets. Losing Ren was unthinkable. This weight in my skull is his weight; I'll bear it gladly.

name: 紅雀
message: "Ow... So I guess it worked?"

name: クリア
message: "Everyone's back. And Master's fine too! Hooray!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Any longer and we'd have been in deep shit."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Everyone... Thanks for coming."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't sweat it, man. What're friends for?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I didn't do it for you."

name: クリア
message: "I'm so glad Ren's back too!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 蓮
message: "Sorry for the trouble."

name: ベニ
message: "You should be sorry, furball! Makin' me worry like that!"

name: トリ
message: "I'm impressed you survived that bug."
Phew. Looks like everyone's safe.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What happened to the guards and their Allmates?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Probably passed out somewhere. Don't worry about it."

name: 紅雀
message: "Now we get our hands on that bastard Toue. I can't wait to beat the shit outta him!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Toue... That's right! How are things back home? Is everyone okay?"

name: 紅雀
message: "For now. But at the end of the event today, they're gonna broadcast his closing statement across the entire island."

name: ノイズ
message: "He must have something big planned. Yesterday was music, so this time..."

name: ミンク
message: "Probably light and sound. He'll want to control as many people as possible."
I recall what Virus and Trip told me. Toue must be planning to use that device that mimics Sei's powers.
We have to stop him.
And... I want to save Sei, if we can.
The only reason I'm here is because Granny saved me. Sei deserves a chance too.

name: 紅雀
message: "So, where is he? Upstairs?"

name: ミンク
message: "Toue's office should be on the highest floor."

name: ノイズ
message: "Probably compensating."

name: 紅雀
message: "But how do we get there?"
